recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: Here is a blueberry flapjack the DIY flavor shack BBM and CAP Cake batter and WF angle cake make up for the flap jack and so of course the DIY flavor shack BBM also holds for a bit of the blueberry along with the blueberry wild by TFA and then I added some golden syrup to give the blueberry a syrupy feel along with some vanilla custard by TFA to bring everything together . and a dash of butter to make everything delicious.
